entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 9. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
